text: The year 2005 in science had some important events, listed below. == Events == * January 26 - The European Space Agency's SMART-1 sends back close range pictures of the lunar surface. * February 23 - Astronomers announce discovery of the new galaxy VIRGOHI21 that's made mostly of dark matter. * November 30 - Surgeons in France did the first face transplant. == Deaths == * February 3 - Ernst W. Mayr, important evolutionary biologist Category:2005 Category:Years in science
title: 2005 in science
